content:
The Cambridge Computer Science department is hiring a new faculty position in Logical Foundations and Formal Methods. Researchers using category theory in a computer science context would certainly be within scope. Cambridge is a wonderful place to build a career as a permanent academic. I'm happy to handle informal enquiries (by email). The closing date is 5 December 2022.

Here is the job advert: https://www.jobs.cam.ac.uk/job/37369/
This topic was moved here from #general > Cambridge faculty position, category-theory friendly by Matteo Capucci (he/him).
